title: Configure APM Server and Application Instrumentation
description: Configure APM Server and Application Instrumentation.

effort_estimate.justification: APM provides insights into application performance and helps identify performance issues.

user_stories: As a developer, I want to monitor application performance so that I can identify and resolve performance issues.
business_rules: APM Server must be set up to collect application performance data.
Application instrumentation must be implemented to collect performance metrics.
Service maps must be created to visualize service dependencies.
Performance baselines must be established to identify performance regressions.
edge_cases: Minimizing the overhead of application instrumentation.

acceptance_criteria: APM Server is running and collecting application performance data.

additional_context.technical_notes: Ensure APM Server is properly configured and integrated with the application.
additional_context.security_considerations: Secure the APM system to prevent unauthorized access to performance data.
